body_html: I don't think it's clearer to return the output h as part of the recurrent state as the essential trick of the SRU is that only c takes part in the recurrence. This pr makes it look like h is used for the next timestep.
body_text: I don't think it's clearer to return the output h as part of the recurrent state as the essential trick of the SRU is that only c takes part in the recurrence. This pr makes it look like h is used for the next timestep.
body: I don't think it's clearer to return the output h as part of the recurrent state as the essential trick of the SRU is that only c takes part in the recurrence. This pr makes it look like h is used for the next timestep.
